# EMEpy

<!-- .. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents: -->

EMEpy is an open-source eigenmode expansion solver implemented in Python. 

**Key Features**


# Eigenmode Expansion

# Installation

EMEpy can be found on pip. 

    pip install emepy

For the latest version, the source code can be found on [GitHub](https://github.com/BYUCamachoLab/emepy). Clone the directory onto your local desktop. 

    pip install -e .
